item.title: Letterhead Template for Pandoc
item.description: This is not a workflow post. I don’t normally post about process or things related to my workflow because, having tried in the past, have concluded that it is more of a procrastination tactic than anything else.

item.title: APSA 2017, Job Market Edition
item.description: Heading to ‘Frisco for APSA this week.^[NB: I use this term ‘frisco’ not without some reservation as I know locals of San Francisco loath it with a fiery passion of a 1000 suns.
